GS41yogay2_u:16: YY_1.1a/.yaś cakṣur jagataḥ sahasrakarabad dhāmnāṃ ca dhāmā 'rkavan
GS41yogay2_u:17: YY_1.1b/.mokṣadvāram apāvṛttaṃ ca ravivad dhvāntāntakṛt sūryavat/
GS41yogay2_u:19: YY_1.1d/.sādhvīṃ naḥ sa giraṃ karotu savitā yo 'anyair atulyopamaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:24: YY_1.3a/.karma 'nyajanmajanitaṃ[K.nyajanmani kṛtaṃ] sad asac ca daivaṃ
GS41yogay2_u:27: YY_1.3d/.puṃdaivajā kṛṣivad ity upapādyam etat[K.ata udyameta]//
GS41yogay2_u:29: YY_1.4c/.syāc chidram ekam api cet tata eva sarvaṃ
GS41yogay2_u:30: YY_1.4d/.nāśaṃ prayāti hi dṛteḥ sravaṇād[K.dṛteś caraṇād] iva 'mbhaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:34: YY_1.6d/.kasmāt tadā narapatir na bhavet purodhāḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:39: YY_1.8a/.svadeśe santuṣṭaḥ karituragakośe sati na yo
GS41yogay2_u:40: YY_1.8b/.bhaved yāyī saindhaiḥ[K.so 'nyaiḥ] kṛtaparibhavo yāti vilayam/
GS41yogay2_u:42: YY_1.8d/.gato yo nādatte[K.'nyān ādatte] sunayacarito nītividhūrān//
GS41yogay2_u:43: YY_1.9a/.ulūkasya dhvāṃkṣo niśi valibhujāṃ so 'hni vaśagaḥ
GS41yogay2_u:44: YY_1.9a/.sthale nakraṃ siṃho mṛgapam udke hanti jalajaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:45: YY_1.9b/.abudhyā yaḥ kālaṃ vrajati nṛpatir deśam athavā[K.omitted]
GS41yogay2_u:46: YY_1.9c/.hate darpe vākyaṃ smarati viduṣāṃ so 'rivaśagaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:48: YY_1.10a/.ripoḥ kṛtvā 'vajñāṃ jitam iti viditvā madabalān
GS41yogay2_u:49: YY_1.10b/.na yatno hātavyaḥ śikhiviṣasamo 'lpo 'pi hi ripuḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:51: YY_1.10d/.hato baddhastambhe kakhati[K.baddhaḥ stambhekaṣati] madalekhāṃ dvipapatiḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:54: YY_1.11d/.kṛtvā śūrāptasaṃsthaṃ paraviṣayam iyāc chuddhapārṣṇir narendraḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:57: YY_1.12c/.bhaktyā[K.sāmnā] sādhūn dhanavirahitān arthalubdhāṃś ca dānair
GS41yogay2_u:58: YY_1.12d/.neyād[K.bhedyān] bhedais tribhir api na ye sādhayet tāṃś ca daṇḍaiḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:62: YY_1.13d/.tat tat siddhiṃ vrajati tad ahaḥsv āṃśakair[K.aṃśake] vāpi teṣāṃ//
GS41yogay2_u:64: YY_1.14b/.naitau ced āsanaṃ tat parapuragamanaṃ sarvasaineyna yānam/
GS41yogay2_u:65: YY_1.14c/.sainyārddhenābhiyukte parapuram api yat tad dvidhāyānam uktaṃ
GS41yogay2_u:66: YY_1.14d/.saṃśleṣo 'nyatra yaḥ syāt sa khalu nigaditaḥ saṃśrayo 'nyo[K.'ntyo] guṇānam//
GS41yogay2_u:71: YY_1.16a/.yānaṃ yāyibhir āsanaṃ śubhakarair vīryānvitair nāgarair
GS41yogay2_u:72: YY_1.16b/.dvaidhībhāvam iyād yadā śubhakarāḥ paurāḥ sayāyigrahāḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:73: YY_1.16c/.saumyaiḥ sandhir asadgrahaiś ca balibhir yuddhe 'nukūlair jayaḥ
GS41yogay2_u:74: YY_1.16d/.sarvair apy aśubhapradair narapatir daivāmbitaṃ saṃśrayet//
GS41yogay2_u:76: YY_1.17b/.pakṣī vipakṣa iva kiṃ nidhanaḥ[K.vidhanaṃ] karoti/
GS41yogay2_u:83: YY_1.19b/.chidre ripor na niyamo 'sti[K.'tra] ca kecid āhuḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:88: YY_1.20c/.jahyān na cārtham ati[K.api] daivaparo 'pi bhūtvā
GS41yogay2_u:91: YY_1.21b/.prāpnoti tan na samayaṃ[K.sa punaḥ] khalu kālakāṃksī/
GS41yogay2_u:95: YY_1.22b/.saṃsiddhim apy upakaroti guṇaṃ na puṃsām/
GS41yogay2_u:98: YY_2.1ab/.raktāsitādyā hi yathāmbarasya varṇāḥ sitasyaiṣa bhavanti samyak/
GS41yogay2_u:101: YY_2.2cd/.parokṣanindeti ca kāmajāni daśaiva vindyād[K.vidyād] vyasanāni puṃsām//
GS41yogay2_u:102: YY_2.3ab/.vākpāruṣyaṃ daṇḍapāruṣyam īrṣyāṃ[K.īrṣyā] droho 'sūyā paiśunaṃ sāhasañ ca/
GS41yogay2_u:103: YY_2.3cd/.arthasyoktaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ ca 'ṣṭasaṃkhyaḥ krodhodbhūto varga eṣa pradiṣṭaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:104: YY_2.4ab/.mahad idam anayānām āspadaṃ madyam āhus tanudhanamatisattvaśreyasāṃ karṣaṇāya/
GS41yogay2_u:105: YY_2.4cd/.samupahatamatiḥ san[K.saṃs] tatpradhānendriyatvād gaṇayati na hi bhakṣyābhakṣyam anyāni caivam//
GS41yogay2_u:106: YY_2.5a/.patnīyaty api mātaraṃ madavaśāt patnīṃ ca mātrīyati
GS41yogay2_u:107: YY_2.5b/.śvabhrīyaty api mandiraṃ ślathaśilaṃ kūpaṃ ca gehīyati/
GS41yogay2_u:108: YY_2.5c/.svalpaṃ vāry udadhīyatīśvaram apāṃ mohāt sthalīyaty api
GS41yogay2_u:109: YY_2.5d/.mitrīyaty api pārthivaṃ kim aparaṃ kuryān na yan madyapaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:110: YY_2.6ab/.bhūyo 'pi dīvyati jito jayalipsayaiva prāpnoti tac ca saviśeṣataraṃ kadācit/
GS41yogay2_u:111: YY_2.6cd/.kṛtvā 'priyāṇi madataḥ parito 'py aṭanti[K.paritapya cānte] bhūyaḥ[K.bhūpaḥ] pivet kim api doṣaviśeṣakāṃkṣī//
GS41yogay2_u:113: YY_2.7cd/.dyūtaṃ vinendriyasukhāni hitāni yuktyā vijñasya[K.śūnyaṃ hi] jīvitaphalaṃ viṣayair vinā kim//
GS41yogay2_u:116: YY_2.8c/.bandhur nāsya nibandhanaṃ na śapatho lokadvayaṃ nekṣyate
GS41yogay2_u:117: YY_2.8d/.māyāvī kulapāṃśalaś ca kitavo doṣākaro[K.doṣārṇavo] niḥsukhaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:118: YY_2.9ab/.daivajñamantrisuhṛdāptavacāṃsi rājā yo na ''driyen nijaviceṣṭitaduṣṭabuddhiḥ[K.driyet svamaticeṣṭitaduṣṭabuddhiḥ]/
GS41yogay2_u:119: YY_2.9cd/.so 'gremareṇa[K.sannāyakena] rahito 'ndha iva 'cireṇa hāsyatvam eti patito viṣaye ripūṇām//
GS41yogay2_u:120: YY_2.10a/.medhāvī matimān adīnavacano dakṣaḥ kṣamāvān ṛjur
GS41yogay2_u:121: YY_2.10b/.dharmātmāpy[K.dharmātmā tv] anasūyako laghukaraḥ ṣāḍguṇyavic chaktimān/
GS41yogay2_u:123: YY_2.10d/.śūro na vyasanī smaraty upakṛtiṃ[K.upakṛtaṃ] vṛddhopasevī ca yaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:126: YY_2.12ab/.tyāgī vinītaḥ priyadarśanaś ca vyapetamohaḥ pratipattiyuktaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:127: YY_2.12cd/.deśasya kālasya ca bhāgavijñaḥ[K.bhāgavid yaḥ] svayaṃ ca yaḥ syād vyavahāradarśī//
GS41yogay2_u:129: YY_2.13cd/.smitābhibhāṣī mitasatyavaktā daivānvito yasya[K.yaś ca] sa dhāma lakṣmyāḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:130: YY_2.14ab/.guṇaiḥ samastair api saṃprayuktā kanyeva yātrā viguṇāya dattā/
GS41yogay2_u:134: YY_2.16ab/.yātrā viśuddhā 'pi samaṃ pravṛttā pātrānurūpāṇi phalāni dhatte/
GS41yogay2_u:135: YY_2.16cd/.jagaty udīrṇā 'pi hi kauśikasya bhā bhānavī naiva tamaḥ pramārṣṭi//
GS41yogay2_u:138: YY_2.18ab/.anādśritaḥ khyātaguṇaḥ paro 'pi śūro 'thavā sādhujanaḥ praśastaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:141: YY_2.19cd/.śayyāṃ tyajet tūryaravāvasāne śṛṇvan giro maṅgalapāṭhakānām//
GS41yogay2_u:142: YY_2.20ab/.ajñātapūrvāṇi na dantakāṣṭhāny adyān na patraiś ca samanvitāni/
GS41yogay2_u:143: YY_2.20cd/.na cordhvaśuṣkāni[K.yugmaparvāṇi] na pāṭitāni na yugmaparvāṇi[K.cordhvaśuṣkāni] vinā tvacā ca//
GS41yogay2_u:144: YY_2.21ab/.udaṅmukhaḥ prāṅmukhasaṃsthito vā ṛjv abraṇaṃ tac ca vitastimātram/
GS41yogay2_u:145: YY_2.21cd/.adyān narendro viniyamya[K.vinigṛhyā] vācaṃ prakṣālya jahyāc ca śubhapradeśe[K.śucau pradeśe]//
GS41yogay2_u:146: YY_2.22ab/.abhimukhapatitaṃ praśāntadiksthaṃ śubham atiśobhanam ūrdhvasaṃsthitaṃ ca/
GS41yogay2_u:147: YY_2.22cd/.aśubhakaram ato 'nyathā pradiṣṭaṃ sthitapatitaṃ ca karoti miṣṭam[K.mṛṣṭam] annam//
GS41yogay2_u:148: YY_2.23ab/.praṇamya devāṃś ca gurūṃś[K.devāṇ svagurūṃś ca] pūrvaṃ datvā ca gāṃ vatsayutāṃ dvijāya/
GS41yogay2_u:149: YY_2.23cd/.dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ sarpiṣi darpaṇe ca nakṣatram ādau śṛṇuyāt tithiṃ ca//
GS41yogay2_u:150: YY_2.24ab/.śrutvā tithiṃ bhagrahavāsaraṃ[K.bhaṃ grahavāsaraṃ] ca prāpnoti dharmārthayaśāṃsi saukhyam/
GS41yogay2_u:151: YY_2.24cd/.ārogyam āyur vijayaṃ sutāṃś ca duḥsvapnajātaṃ[K.duḥsvapnaghātaṃ] priyatāṃ ca loke//
GS41yogay2_u:154: YY_2.26cd/.yathābhirūpaṃ[K.yathānūpaṃ] hṛdayāny api dviṣāṃ prasādayan dharmasabhāṃ samāśrayet//
GS41yogay2_u:155: YY_2.27ab/.vinītaveṣābharaṇaḥ sadakṣiṇaṃ[K.vinītaveṣābharaṇaś ca dakṣiṇaṃ] kara[K.karaṃ] samudyamya vicakṣaṇānvitaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:156: YY_2.27cd/.sukhopaviṣṭaḥ sthita eva vā nṛpaḥ samārimitro vyavahāradarśane//
GS41yogay2_u:157: YY_2.28ab/.kṣamānvito 'smīti vicintyam etad daṇḍyeṣu daṇḍakṣamaṇaṃ na dharmaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:158: YY_2.28cd/.daṇḍaprabhoāvo hi sa durjanasya haste na yo jīvati sādhuvargaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:160: YY_2.29cd/.ata ugratareṇa te nivarttyā yena 'nye 'pi khalās tathā na bhūyaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:161: YY_2.30ab/.yasmin gṛhītaḥ[K.gṛhīte] sadṛśāparādho mahājanas trāsam upaiti tasmin/
GS41yogay2_u:162: YY_2.30cd/.daṇḍo nipātyo manujeśvarena kālāntare 'nyad vyapadiśya kāryam//
GS41yogay2_u:163: YY_2.31ab/.dvirada iva madena viprayukto viṣarahito bhujago vyasiś ca kośaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:164: YY_2.31cd/.paribhavam upayāti na 'parādhe yadi manujādhipatiḥ karoti daṇḍam//
GS41yogay2_u:165: YY_2.32ab/.ekasya tulyodarapāṇipādā daṇḍāt prabhītāḥ[K.daṇḍasya bhītāḥ] praṇamanti martyāḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:167: YY_2.33ab/.duṣṭasya daṇḍaḥ sujanasya pūjā nyāyena kośasya ca saṃpravṛddhiḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:168: YY_2.33cd/.apakṣapāto 'rthiṣu rāṣṭrarakṣā pañcaiva yajñāḥ kathitā nṛpāṇām//
GS41yogay2_u:169: YY_2.34ab/.śrāntaś ca tasmin viniyujya sādhūn saṃgrāmavidyādivibhaktakālaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:170: YY_2.34cd/.sarvāṇi kāryāṇi yathākrameṇa kuryān nṛpaḥ pratyaham ātmavāṃś ca//
GS41yogay2_u:171: YY_2.35ab/.rājñā kāryaṃ pañcame pañcame 'hni kṣaurarkṣe vā śmaśru bhasyodaye[K.tasyodaye] vā/
GS41yogay2_u:172: YY_2.35cd/.tyaktvā tārāḥ pañcasaptatripūrvā[K.saptapañcatripūrvā] yātrākāle naiva kāryaṃ na yuddhe//
GS41yogay2_u:173: YY_2.36ab/.ācārasthaḥ sāgarāntāṃ dharitrīṃ bhuṅkte dīrdhaṃ kālam utkhātaśatruḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:174: YY_2.36cd/.yatrā ''cāras tatra dharmasya vṛddhir dharmād bhogān dehabhede 'pi bhuṅkte//E36
GS41yogay2_u:176: YY_3.1cd/.upahatam upalabhya cāsya deśaṃ balam athavā nirupadruto 'bhiyuñjyāt//
GS41yogay2_u:177: YY_3.2ab/.pracuramaśakayūkaṃ makṣikādamśapūrvaṃ balam ajaladavṛṣṭyā pāṃśuvātāhataṃ vā[K.pāṃśupātāhataṃ ca]/
GS41yogay2_u:178: YY_3.2cd/.piśitarudhiradhānyaprāṇivṛṣṭyā hatam vā[K. ca] karituragamanuṣyā yatra vādhyā na dīnāḥ[K.ca dhyānadīnāḥ]//
GS41yogay2_u:181: YY_3.3c/.kaṣṭaṃ ko naḥ śaraṇam iti vā vādino yasya sainye
GS41yogay2_u:188: YY_3.5cd/.amaṅgalāceṣṭitajātahāsāḥ sainye narā yasya sa cābhiyojyaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:192: YY_3.7cd/.avārideśe salilapravṛtir ahaitukaṃ[K.avaikṛte] cāpsu tarec chilā vā//
GS41yogay2_u:194: YY_3.8cd/.agnirūpam anilena vinā vā niścalāni ca yadā pracalanti//
GS41yogay2_u:197: YY_3.10ab/.dīrghaṃ dīnaṃ saṃhatāḥ sārameyāḥ krośanty uccair nityam eva 'nṛtau ca/
GS41yogay2_u:198: YY_3.10cd/.hanyur yoṣā yoṣito nirghṛṇāś ca dṛṣyaṃ nityaṃ[K.śvetaḥ kāko] naktam idrāyudhaṃ vā[K.ca]//
GS41yogay2_u:199: YY_3.11ab/.tilā vitailā yadi vā 'rddhatailā[K.rddhatailāḥ] sasyasya vṛddhir yadi vā 'tiriktā/
GS41yogay2_u:200: YY_3.11cd/.annasya vairasyam asṛk tarūṇāṃ śuṣkapraroho virujāṃ praṇāśaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:202: YY_3.12cd/.vrajanti vā maithunam anyajātyāṃ dīptāś ca nityaṃ vihagā mṛgāś ca//
GS41yogay2_u:203: YY_3.13ab/.bhaṅgaḥ pātas toraṇendradhvajānāṃ śītoṣmānāṃ vyatyayo bhūvidāraḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:204: YY_3.13cd/.nimnoccānāṃ tuṅgatā nimnatā ca[K.vā] chāyā cā[K.vā] 'rkasya ''bhimukhyena yātā//
GS41yogay2_u:206: YY_3.14cd/.vyaktir bhavec ca 'hani tārakāṇāṃ naktaṃ ca tārāgaṇasaṃpraṇāśaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:208: YY_3.15cd/.ekāṇḍajatvam[K.ekātmajatvam] athavā bhuvi maṇḍalāni kurvanti cakrakam ivopari vā bhramantaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:210: YY_3.16cd/.ketur gatisparśana -- dhūpanena cāreṇa pīḍāṃ kurute 'rkaputraḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:211: YY_3.17ab/.tribhis tribhir bhair atha kṛttikādyair nipīḍitair[K.niṣpīḍitair] bhūpatayo 'bhiyojyāḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:212: YY_3.17cd/.pāñcālanātho magadhādhipaś ca kaliṅgarāḍ ujjayinīpatiś ca//
GS41yogay2_u:214: YY_3.18cd/.ete hi kūrmāṅgasamāśritānāṃ viśeṣapīḍām upayānti bhūpāḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:215: YY_3.19ab/.aṅgeṣu sūryo yavaneṣu candro bhaumo hy avantyāṃ magadheṣu saumyaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:216: YY_3.19cd/.sindhau gurur bhojakaṭe ca[K.bhojakaṭeṣu] śukraḥ sauraḥ surāṣṭre viṣaye babhūva//
GS41yogay2_u:217: YY_3.20ab/.mleccheṣu ketuś ca tamaḥ kaliṅge yāto[K.jāto] yato 'taḥ paripīḍayanti[K.paripiḍitās te]/
GS41yogay2_u:219: YY_3.21ab/.sampūjyante bhairavoccānunādai[K.bhairavoccānurāvai] raktair māṃsais tālajaṅghādayo vā/
GS41yogay2_u:220: YY_3.21cd/.dṛśyante vā yātudhānāḥ prabhūtā bhraṣṭaśrīkaḥ so 'pi deśo 'bhiyojyaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:221: YY_3.22ab/.deśabhraṃśo yair nimittaiḥ pradiṣṭas tās tā vārttā vakti loke viśaṅkaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:222: YY_3.22cd/.tyaktvā deśaṃ yānti yaṃ bhikṣukā vā gamyo deśo so 'py asādhupravṛttaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:223: YY_3.23ab/.rogābhibhūtaṃ viṣadūṣitaṃ vā yathā vināśābhimukhaṃ śarīram/
GS41yogay2_u:224: YY_3.23cd/.vaidyaḥ prayogaiḥ sudṛḍhaṃ karoti rāṣṭraṃ tathā śāntibhir agrajanmā//E23
GS41yogay2_u:225: YY_4.1ab/.dehaḥ kośo yoddhā vāhyaṃ mantraḥ śatrur mārgo 'py āyuḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:226: YY_4.1cd/.cittaṃ karma prāptir mantrī prāglagnādyā bhāvāś cintyāḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:227: YY_4.2ab/.trilābhavarjaṃ ravisauribhaumā[K.ravisaurabhaumā] nighnanti no karmaṇi sūryabhaumau[K.sūryabhaumāḥ]/
GS41yogay2_u:228: YY_4.2cd/.puṣṇanti saumyā ripurāśivarjyam astaṃ[K.ripurāśivarjam na 'staṃ] bhṛgur mṛtyuvilagnam induḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:230: YY_4.3cd/.yātrā tathā param idaṃ kathayāmi guhyaṃ śiṣyāya nai 'tad acirād hy uṣitāya dadyāt//
GS41yogay2_u:233: YY_4.5a/.yad yad yogavaśād vrajaty agadatāṃ dravyair viṣaṃ yojitam
GS41yogay2_u:234: YY_4.5b/.saṃyuktaṃ madhunā ghṛtaṃ ca viṣatāṃ gacched[K.gacchad] yathā dṛśyate/
GS41yogay2_u:235: YY_4.5c/.tadvad yogasamudbhavaṃ prakurute hitvā grahaḥ svaṃ phalaṃ
GS41yogay2_u:236: YY_4.5d/.yasmāt tena samudyato 'smi gadituṃ yogān vicitrān imān//
GS41yogay2_u:237: YY_4.6ab/.lagne gurur budhabhṛgū hibukātmajasthau ṣaṣṭhau kujārkatanayau dinakṛt tṛtīyaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:238: YY_4.6cd/.candraś ca yasya daśamo bhavati prayāṇe tasya 'bhivāñchitaphalāptir alaṃ nṛpasya//
GS41yogay2_u:240: YY_4.7cd/.yāto 'tidṛptam api śatrubalaṃ nihanti naiśaṃ tamisram iva tigmam ayūkhakālī[K.ayūkhamālī]//
GS41yogay2_u:242: YY_4.8cd/.na bhavanty arayo 'bhimukhā hariṇā iva keśariṇaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:243: YY_4.9ab/.gurur udaye ripurāśigato 'rko yadi nidhane na ca[K.ca na] śītamayūkhaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:246: YY_4.10cd/.nirgato nṛpatir eti kṛtārtho vainateyavad ahiṃ[K.arīn] vinigṛhya//
GS41yogay2_u:248: YY_4.11cd/.yasya yānasamaye raṇānale tasya yānti śalabhā iva 'rayaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:250: YY_4.12b/.pātāle daśame 'pi vā śaśisuto lagnasthito vākpatiḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:252: YY_4.12d/.yātus tasya na vidviṣo raṇamukhe tiṣṭhanti yoṣā iva//
GS41yogay2_u:253: YY_4.13ab/.saure bhaume[K.vā] lagnage 'rphe[K.'rke] khamadhye karmaṇy āye[K.vā] bhārgave candraje ca/
GS41yogay2_u:254: YY_4.13cd/.yāyād bhūpaḥ[K.bhūpālaḥ] śatrudeśaṃ nihantuṃ dṛptaṃ śatruṃ[K.vā] kālavat[K.kālayat] krūraceṣṭaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:256: YY_4.14cd/.gacchato yadi tato 'sya dharitrī sāgarāmburasanā vaśam eti//
GS41yogay2_u:259: YY_4.15cd/.yasyodyame tasya balaṃ ripūṇāṃ kṛtaṃ kṛtaghnesv iva yāt nāśam//
GS41yogay2_u:260: YY_4.16ab/.candre 'stage devagurau vilagne jñaśukrayoḥ karmaṇi lābhage 'rke/
GS41yogay2_u:261: YY_4.16cd/.saurārayor bhrātṛgayoś ca yāto nṛpaḥ svabhṛtyān iva śāsti śatrūn//
GS41yogay2_u:262: YY_4.17ab/.gurau vilagne yadi vā śaśāṅke ṣaṣṭhe ravau karmagate 'rkaputre/
GS41yogay2_u:263: YY_4.17cd/.sitajñayor bandhusutasthayoś ca yātrā janitrī 'va hitāni dhatte//
GS41yogay2_u:265: YY_4.18cd/.vidāryate śatrubalaṃ samantād dharmo yathā hetuśatair yugānte//
GS41yogay2_u:266: YY_4.19ab/.triṣaṇṇavāntyeṣv abalaḥ śaśāṅkaś cāndrir balī yasya guruś ca kendre/
GS41yogay2_u:267: YY_4.19cd/.tasya 'riyoṣābharaṇaiḥ priyāṇi priyāḥ priyāṇāṃ janayanti sainye//
GS41yogay2_u:269: YY_4.20cd/.pāpair anavāṣṭasaptamair[K.anavāṣṭasaptagair] vasu kiṃ tan na yad āpnuyād gataḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:271: YY_4.21cd/.yātur bhayaṃ na bhavati prataret samudraṃ yady aśmanā[K.'pi] kim uta śatrusamāgameṣu[K.uta 'risamāgameṣu]//
GS41yogay2_u:274: YY_4.23ab/.pūrvoktayoge dhanago budhaś cec chaśāṅkasūryau ca daśāyasaṃsthau/
GS41yogay2_u:277: YY_4.24cd/.yāne 'risainyam upagacchati tasya nāśaṃ ma māṃsakaśravaṇakeṣv[K.mīmāṃsakaśravaṇakeṣv] iva tīrthapuṇyam//
GS41yogay2_u:279: YY_4.25cd/.khalajanajanite 'va lokayātrā na bhavati yasya cirāya śatrusenā//
GS41yogay2_u:281: YY_4.26cd/.ripubalam[K.parabalam] upayāti nāśam āśu śrutam adhanasya kuṭumbacintayaiva[K.kuṭumbacintaye 'va]//
GS41yogay2_u:283: YY_4.27cd/.sārke budhe ca 'ribalaṃ vināśam āyāti guhyaṃ piśuneṣv ivo 'ktam//
GS41yogay2_u:284: YY_4.28ab/.ekāntararkṣe bhṛgujāt kujād vā saumye sthite sūryasutād guror vā/
GS41yogay2_u:285: YY_4.28cd/.pradhvasyate[K.pradhvaṃsate] 'rir na cirād gatasya veṣādhiko bhṛtya ive ''śvarasya//
GS41yogay2_u:286: YY_4.29a[K.30a]/.ekāntarā yadi gatā bhaveneṣu ṣaṭsu pṛṣṭhasthitasya[K.pṛṣṭhasthitaś ca] suraśatruguroḥ[K.suraśatruguruḥ] prayāṇe/
GS41yogay2_u:287: YY_4.29b[K.30b]/.yātasya nātra ripavo prahasanti vīryaṃ viṣṇor ivoddhṛtagadārathavādapāṇeḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:288: YY_4.30ab/.nirantaram yadi bhavaneṣu pañcasu grahāḥ sthitā divasakareṇa varjitāḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:289: YY_4.30cd/.yiyāsator[K.yiyāsato] yadi ca bhavanti pṛṣṭhatas tadā parān balabhid iva 'vakṛntati//
GS41yogay2_u:290: YY_4.31ab/.bṛguputramahendragurū gamane sahitau yadi bhaṃ yugapat tyajataḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:291: YY_4.31cd/.jñagurū yadi vā 'ṃśakam ekagatau[K.ekam itau] samare surarāḍ[K.amararāḍ] iva bhāti tadā//
GS41yogay2_u:292: YY_4.32ab/.nistriṃśavakropagate ca vakre vakreṇa vakraṃ nṛpatiṃ[K.nṛpatir] nihanyāt/
GS41yogay2_u:293: YY_4.32cd/.pānaprasaktaṃ niśi vā prasuptaṃ tasyai 'va ca 'ste yadi vā 'ṃśakaḥ syāt//
GS41yogay2_u:294: YY_4.33ab/.putro dharitryā dinakṛt sutaś ca yadā tyajetāṃ yugapan navāṃśam/
GS41yogay2_u:295: YY_4.33cd/.tadā hy avaskandagato narendro bhuṅkte ripūn tārkṣya iva dvijihvān//
GS41yogay2_u:296: YY_4.34ab/.budhabhārgavamadhyagate himagau hibukopagate ca nṛpaḥ praviśan[K.pravasan]/
GS41yogay2_u:299: YY_4.35cd/.yadā tadā gato nṛpaḥ praśāsty arīn vinā raṇān[K.raṇāt]//
GS41yogay2_u:301: YY_4.36cd/.gamanam avāpya patir manujānāṃ jayati ripūn samareṇa vinai 'va//
GS41yogay2_u:302: YY_4.37ab/.kṣititanayayutān navāṃśakād yadi śatame[K.śatago] bhṛgujo 'thavā guruḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:303: YY_4.37cd/.śataguṇam api hanty arer balaṃ viṣam iva kāyam asṛkpathopapannam[K.asṛkpathopagam]//
GS41yogay2_u:304: YY_4.38ab/.śatāṃśakād ūrdhvam avasthite budhe yamārayos tatra gatasya bhūbhṛtaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:305: YY_4.38cd/.prayāti nāśaṃ samare dviṣaḍ balaṃ yathā 'rthibhāvopagatasya gauravam//
GS41yogay2_u:306: YY_4.39ab/.nakṣatram ekaṃ yugapat praviṣṭau yadā dharitrītanayāmarejyau/
GS41yogay2_u:307: YY_4.39cd/.kuryāt tadā 'ntaṃ dviṣatāṃ balasya drauṇir yathā 'rer niśi sauptikena//
GS41yogay2_u:308: YY_4.40ab/.ṛkṣaṃ gurujñau budhabhārgvau vā yadā praviṣṭau yugapat sametau/
GS41yogay2_u:309: YY_4.40cd/.arthān avāpnoti tadā vicitrān chātraḥ sutīrthān[K.sutīrthād] gurupūjayaiva[K.gurupūjaye 'va]//
GS41yogay2_u:310: YY_4.41ab/.yātrādigīśād yadi pañcame 'nyo gṛhe graho vīryayuto 'vatiṣṭhet/
GS41yogay2_u:311: YY_4.41cd/.samudyatāśākathitāni bhaṅktvā phalāni vīryān nayati svakāṣṭhām//
GS41yogay2_u:312: YY_4.42ab/.eko 'pi jīvajñasitāsitānāṃ kujāt trikoṇe ravito 'tha ve 'nduḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:313: YY_4.42cd/.yatro 'dyatas tatra na yāti yātā tayor balīyān nayati svakāṣṭhām//
GS41yogay2_u:314: YY_4.43ab/.janmodayarkṣaṃ hibukāstasaṃsthaṃ yasya 'śubhair dṛṣṭayutaṃ na saumyaiḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:315: YY_4.43cd/.sa śāṇḍilīṃ prāpya yathā garutmān danyaṃ[K.dainyaṃ] gato 'bhyeti hatasvapakṣaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:316: YY_4.44ab/.horāṣṭame janmagṛhāṣṭame vā svāc chatrubhāc chatrugṛhodaye vā/
GS41yogay2_u:317: YY_4.44cd/.tadrāśipair vā gamanaṃ vilagne tulyaṃ narāṇāṃ viṣabhakṣaṇena//
GS41yogay2_u:321: YY_4.45d/.vrajati yadi yatheṣṭaṃ prāpnuyāt tatra yatā//
GS41yogay2_u:322: YY_4.46ab/.kendratrikoṇeṣu śubhāḥ praśastās teṣv eva pāpā na śubhapradāḥ syuḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:323: YY_4.46cd/.papo 'pi kāmaṃ balavan niyojyaḥ kendreṣu śūnyaṃ na śivāya kendram[K.lagnam]//
GS41yogay2_u:324: YY_4.47ab/.saumyaiś ca pāpaiś ca catuṣṭayasthaḥ kṛcchreṇa siddhiṃ samupaiti yātā/
GS41yogay2_u:326: YY_4.48ab/.guro[K.gurau] vilagne bhṛguje 'risaṃsthe candre 'ṣṭame hanti gato 'risenām/
GS41yogay2_u:327: YY_4.48cd/.viṣṭaṃ[K.vṛṣṭiṃ] yathā dakṣiṇamārgacārī rūkṣo athavā[K.yadā] hrasvatanuś ca śukraḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:328: YY_4.49ab/.siṃhājataulimithunā[K.siṃhājataulimithunaṃ] mṛgakarkaṭau ca sveśānvitā yadi bhavati[K.bhavati] yasya śaniś ca lagne/
GS41yogay2_u:329: YY_4.49cd/.tatsainikāḥ parabalaṃ ksapayanti yātur mūrkhasya vittam iva cāraṇacāṭukārāḥ[K.cāraṇacāṭacakṣāḥ(?)]//
GS41yogay2_u:331: YY_4.50cd/.na bhavanty arayo raṇe sthirāḥ kitavānām iva vittasaṃcayāḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:333: YY_4.51cd/.vātaghūrṇitam iva 'rṇavayānam parabalaṃ hi samupaiti vināśam//
GS41yogay2_u:334: YY_4.52ab/.horā''śrite[K.horāśrite] devagurau prayātā krūragrahaiḥ karmaṇi lābhagair vā/
GS41yogay2_u:335: YY_4.52cd/.kṛtvā ripūṇāṃ kṣayam akṣatāṅgaḥ svayaṃ[K.kṣayaṃ] kṣitīśo 'kṣayakośam eti[K.'kṣayakośa aiti]//
GS41yogay2_u:336: YY_4.53ab/.lābhārthalagneṣu śubhā raviḥ khe yasya ''rasaurau sahaje 'ribhe vā/
GS41yogay2_u:337: YY_4.53cd/.tasya 'rthakośaḥ samupaiti vṛddhiṃ lābho[K.lobho] yathā pratyaham arthavṛddhyā//
GS41yogay2_u:338: YY_4.54ab/.svoccapagair jīvakujārkajārkair ebhyas tribhir vā kathitaikalagne/
GS41yogay2_u:339: YY_4.54cd/.rājñaḥ praṇāśaṃ samupaiti śatruḥ saukhyaṃ dvibhāryasya yathā 'dhanasya//
GS41yogay2_u:340: YY_4.55ab/.eko 'pi jīvārkakujārkajānāṃ svocce vilagne svagṛhe yadī 'nduḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:341: YY_4.55cd/.jātasya[K.yātasya] yānty atra parāḥ praṇāśam mahākulānī 'va kuṭumbabhedaiḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:342: YY_4.56ab/.lagnāc caturthe atibale śaśāṅke[K.vibalaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ] yogād vinā candrabalena yātā[K.yātaḥ]/
GS41yogay2_u:343: YY_4.56cd/.labdhā 'pi lakṣmīṃ bahuratnapūrṇāṃ[K.lakṣmīr bahuratnapūrṇā] kṣipraṃ kṣayaṃ yāti yathā śaśāṅkaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:344: YY_4.57ab/.yeṣāṃ game navamapañcamakaṇṭakasthāḥ saumyās tṛtīyaripulābhagatāś ca pāpāḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:345: YY_4.57cd/.āyānti te svabhavanāni punaḥ kṛtārthā dattā dvijātiṣu purā vidhivad yathārthāḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:346: YY_5.1ab/.pūrvāditas triparivartagatair ajādyair bhaiḥ saptakair analabhāc ca gamo jayāya/
GS41yogay2_u:347: YY_5.1cd/.vāyuagnidiksthaparighasya samārddhagaiś ca maitrāśvihastagurubheṣu ca sarvadikṣu//
GS41yogay2_u:348: YY_5.2ab/.pūrveṇāindraṃ[K.pūrveṇāi ''ndraṃ] dakṣiṇena ''japādaṃ rohiṇyo 'taś ca 'ryamākhyaṃ ca śūlam/
GS41yogay2_u:349: YY_5.2cd/.kāmaṃ yāyāt sāmparāyeṣu kāryeṣv evaṃ dvāre[K.advāre 'pi] projjhya śūlāni tāni//
GS41yogay2_u:350: YY_5.3ab/.vivarjayet tvāṣṭrayamoragāṇām ardham dvitīyaṃ gamane jayepsuḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:351: YY_5.3cd/.pūrvārdham āgneyamaghānilānāṃ svātīm[K.svātim] maghāṃ co 'śanasaḥ samastām//
GS41yogay2_u:352: YY_5.4ab/.utpātapāpagrahapīḍite bhe ye yānti bhūrigrahasaṃyute vā/
GS41yogay2_u:353: YY_5.4cd/.te pūrvavittāny api nāśayanti dhātuprasaktā iva mūrttikendrāḥ[K.vārtikendrāḥ]//
GS41yogay2_u:355: YY_5.5cd/.vrajati yadi lalāṭage digīśe patati tato drumavat sarittaṭātsaḥ[K.sarittaṭasthaḥ]//
GS41yogay2_u:356: YY_5.6ab/.yāto 'yanasya pratilomakāṣṭhāṃ yaḥ syāt svatantro[K.sutantro] 'pi jitaḥ pareṣāṃ/
GS41yogay2_u:357: YY_5.6cd/.sa kevalavyākaraṇābhiyuktaḥ[K.kevalaṃ] vyākaraṇābhiyuktaḥ kāvyajñagoṣṭhyām iva hāsyam eti//
GS41yogay2_u:358: YY_5.7ab/.ayanena gato 'rkasomayor dyuniśaṃ vā sthitayoḥ pṛthak pṛthak/
GS41yogay2_u:359: YY_5.7cd/.viduṣām iva sarvaśāstravit[K.śabdaśāstravit] samavāye dviṣatāṃ virājate//
GS41yogay2_u:360: YY_5.8ab/.tithiṃ caturthīṃ navamīṃ caturdaśīṃ vihāya viṣṭiṃ karaṇaṃ ca gacchataḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:362: YY_5.9ab/.ṛkṣe[K.rikte] tithau vā vyatipātaduṣṭe yo yāti mohāt khalu vaidhṛte vā/
GS41yogay2_u:363: YY_5.9cd/.sa nāśam āyāty acireṇa yātā[K.rājā] rāje 'va daivajñavilomaceṣṭaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:364: YY_5.10ab/.ārogyam ṛkṣeṇa dhanaṃ kṣaṇena kāryasya siddhis tithinā śubhena/
GS41yogay2_u:365: YY_5.10cd/.rāśyudgamena 'dhvani siddhim āhuḥ prāyaḥ śubhāni[K.sukhāni] kṣaṇadākareṇa//
GS41yogay2_u:366: YY_5.11ab[K.omitted]/.na rājate bhūriguṇānvitā 'pi vyarhtabyayasya kṣitipasya yātrā/
GS41yogay2_u:368: YY_5.12ab/.pratiśukrabudhāśanivṛṣṭihatā dig adhaḥ kurute nṛpatiṃ gamane/
GS41yogay2_u:370: YY_5.13ab/.vīryānvitair yāyibhir ātmabhadraiḥ kleśaṃ[K.kleśed] vinā hanti camūm arīṇām/
GS41yogay2_u:372: YY_5.14ab/.sarpis tilaudanaṣaiḥ[K.tilodanajhaṣaiḥ] payasā ca bhuktvā pūrvādi vāraṇarathāśvanarair gatasya/
GS41yogay2_u:373: YY_5.14cd/.soḍhum pratāpam arayo na nrpasya śaktā gandhadvipasya kalabhā iva gandhadānam[K.dānagandham]//
GS41yogay2_u:374: YY_5.15ab/.ekataś ca sakalāni nimittāny ekataś ca manasaḥ pariśuddhiḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:375: YY_5.15cd/.cetaso 'sti[K.'pi] sahasā na[K.'sti] raṇe bhīr māruto 'pi vijayājayahetuḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:379: YY_5.17cd/.timirāṇi gabhastimān iva prasabhaṃ hanti balāni vidviṣām//
GS41yogay2_u:382: YY_5.19ab/.lagnasya ye 'ṃśā hy uditā[K.uditā] graho yas teṣu sthito lagnaphalaṃ sa dhatte/
GS41yogay2_u:383: YY_5.19cd/.yas tān atītaḥ sa bhaved dvitīyaḥ sthāneṣu śeṣeṣv api cintyam etat[K.cintanīyam]//
GS41yogay2_u:385: YY_5.20cd/.ripoḥ pramathnāti raṇājire camūṃ dvipaḥ samūlāṃ sarasī 'va padminīm//
GS41yogay2_u:386: YY_5.21ab/.daivena hīnaḥ parabhīṣaṇārthaṃ yāto 'tikṛcchreṇa nayaty ahāni/
GS41yogay2_u:389: YY_5.22cd/.bhuṅkte mahīṃ samyag avāpya yātrāṃ sasahyavindyācalapāriyātrām//
GS41yogay2_u:390: YY_5.23ab/.gocareṇa śubhadaḥ śaśī na ced aṣṭavargapariśodhito 'pi[K'tha] vā/
GS41yogay2_u:391: YY_5.23cd/.pūrvavāyur iva puṣpakālajo yāyinām phalavināśakṛd bhavet//
GS41yogay2_u:392: YY_5.24ab/.āśritya candrasya balābalāni grahāḥ prayacchanti śubhāśubhāni/
GS41yogay2_u:393: YY_5.24cd/.manaḥsametāni yathendriyāṇi karmārhatāṃ[K.karmaṇyatāṃ] yānti na kevalāni//
GS41yogay2_u:394: YY_5.25ab/.sarvataḥ kṣutam aśobhanam uktaṃ goḥ kṣutaṃ[K.gokṣutam] maraṇaṃ eva karoti/
GS41yogay2_u:395: YY_5.25cd/.kecid āhur aphalaṃ bakād ca[K.hi balād] yad vṛddhapīnasitabālākṛtaṃ ca//
GS41yogay2_u:396: YY_5.26ab/.śakunatithibhalābhe chattraśayyāsanādyaṃ padam api vijigīṣuś cālayec chradadhānaḥ[K.chraddhadhānaḥ]/
GS41yogay2_u:397: YY_5.26cd/.yadi śakunanimittasvapnacetoviśuddhir[K.śakunanimitte 'sya svacetoviśuddhir] na bhavati tad aniṣṭaṃ sarvakāryeṣu yānam//
GS41yogay2_u:400: YY_5.28ab/.udaye śaśino 'ṃśake 'hni vā bhavati gato na cireṇa durmanāḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:401: YY_5.28cd/.pramadām iva jātayauvanāṃ[K.yātayauvanāṃ] ratyarthaṃ samavāpya karkaśaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:402: YY_5.29ab/.bhaumodaye 'ṃśe 'hani vā 'sya yātrā karoti bandhaṃ vadham arthanāśam/
GS41yogay2_u:404: YY_5.30ab/.budhasya lagnāṃśakavāsareṣu yātrā naraṃ prīṇayati prakāmam/
GS41yogay2_u:407: YY_5.31cd/.jāye 'va bhartur manaso 'nukūlā kulābhivṛddhyai ratidā hitā ca//
GS41yogay2_u:408: YY_5.32ab/.yātrā bhṛgor aṃśadinodayeṣu prīṇāti kāmair vividhair yiyāsum//

GS41yogay2_u:911: YY_14.16ab/.lomāsikā piṅgalachappikākhyau valgulyulūkau śaśakaś ca rātrau/
GS41yogay2_u:912: YY_14.16cd/.sarve svakālotkramacāriṇaḥ syur daśasya nāśāya nṛpān tadā vā//
GS41yogay2_u:913: YY_14.17cd/.pṛṣatamṛgaśṛgālaśvāvidhākhyā 'nyapuṣṭā dyuniśam api viḍālaḥ sārasaḥ śūkaraś ca//
GS41yogay2_u:915: YY_14.18cd/.saphalā viphalā viparyayasthā gamanepsoḥ purapārthivāśubhās te//
GS41yogay2_u:916: YY_14.19ab/.yānaṃ dhureṇa patitaṃ bṛhatī ca kanyā garbheṇa cātimahatā purataḥ sthito strī/
GS41yogay2_u:917: YY_14.19cd/.āgaccha tiṣṭha viśa gacchasi vā kim arthaṃ śabdāḥ sthiraś ca gamanaṃ pratiṣedhayanti//
GS41yogay2_u:918: YY_14.20ab/.gāndhāraṣaḍjaṛṣabhāḥ khalu madhyamaś ca yāne svarāḥ śubhakarā na tu ye 'tra śeṣāḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:919: YY_14.20cd/.grāmau śubhāv api ca madhyamaṣaḍjasañjñau gāndhāragītam api bhadram uśanti devāḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:920: YY_14.21ab/.sarvatra pāpaṃ kṣutam uddiśanti gos tu kṣutaṃ mṛtyukaraṃ yiyāsoḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:921: YY_14.21cd/.mārjārarāvaskhalanaṃ ca yātur vastrasya bhaṅgaś ca na śobhanāni//
GS41yogay2_u:923: YY_14.22cd/.ṣaṇḍhakamadyakarāv api paścāt āsanasīrakhalaiḥ saha codak//
GS41yogay2_u:924: YY_14.23ab/.dravyāṇi śuklāni turaṅgamaś ca pūrveṇa yāmyena śavaṃ samāsam/
GS41yogay2_u:925: YY_14.23cd/.paścāt kumārī dadhi cātiśastaṃ saumyena gobrāhmaṇasādhavaś ca//
GS41yogay2_u:926: YY_14.24ab/.yaḥ pūrṇakūṭaḥ sakarāyikākhyo vāmaḥ praśastaḥ sa ca pūrvadeśe/
GS41yogay2_u:927: YY_14.24cd/.kākaḥ śubho dakṣiṇataś ca teṣām anyeṣu deśeṣu viparyayeṇa//
GS41yogay2_u:928: YY_14.25ab/.vāme śasto dhanvanaḥ siddhidātā prottuṅgaś ced dhastamātram jayāya/
GS41yogay2_u:929: YY_14.25cd/.ākāyaś ced unnato vāmabhāge pṛthvīlābhaṃ dhanvanāgaḥ karoti//
GS41yogay2_u:930: YY_14.26cd/.vrajati yadi puro 'vamūtrya yātuḥ kṣapayati śatrubalaṃ tato narendraḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:932: YY_14.27cd/.na śubho 'bhimukho bhaṣan vidhunvan yudhyan gāṃ vilikhan nakhair vamaṃś ca//
GS41yogay2_u:933: YY_14.28ab/.uttānāpādaḥ svapate ca pāpo vilokya sūryaṃ viruvaṃś ca dīnam/
GS41yogay2_u:934: YY_14.28cd/.śuṣkāsthilābhābhimukhaś ca kaṣṭo māṃsādibhiḥ pūrṇamukhaś ca śastaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:935: YY_14.29ab/.pūrṇānano yasya kroti cāṣaḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ svastikam eva vā khe/
GS41yogay2_u:936: YY_14.29cd/.lābho mahāntasya parābhavāya kālena bhaṅgo vijayo jayo 'sya//
GS41yogay2_u:937: YY_14.30ab/.kāryantu mūlaśakune 'ntaraje tad ahni vindyāt phalaṃ niyatam evam ime vicintyāḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:938: YY_14.30cd/.prāraṃbhayānasamayeṣu tathā praveśe grāhyaṃ kṣutan na śubhadaṃ kvacid apy uśanti//
GS41yogay2_u:939: YY_14.31a/.krośād ūrdhvaṃ śakunavirutaṃ niṣphalaṃ prāhur eke
GS41yogay2_u:940: YY_14.31b/.tatrāniṣṭe prathamaśakune mānayet pañca ṣaṭ ca/
GS41yogay2_u:942: YY_14.31d/.pratyāgacchet svabhavanam ato yady aniṣṭas tṛtīyaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:943: YY_14.32ab/.śubhaṃ daśāpākam avighnasiddhiṃ mūlābhirakṣām athavā sahāyān/
GS41yogay2_u:944: YY_14.32cd/.duṣṭasya saṃsiddhim anāmayatvaṃ vadanti te mānayitur nṛpasya//E32
GS41yogay2_u:949: YY_15.3ab/.deśaguṇaiḥ prathitāś ca purogās te bahavo guṇalakṣaṇalakṣyāḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:951: YY_15.4ab/.daṇḍoragau ravisutasya raves tu cakraṃ śukrasya padmaśakaṭau garuḍo budhasya/
GS41yogay2_u:952: YY_15.4cd/.vyūhau tu sūcimakarau dharaṇīsutasya śyeno guroḥ śiśiragor api maṇḍalākhyaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:953: YY_15.5ab/.vyūham ātmaśubhadagrahasya yad vidviṣām aśubhasaṃsthitasya vā/
GS41yogay2_u:954: YY_15.5cd/.tatprayojyam ariyojitasya vā ghātanaṃ tadaribhir balottaraiḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:957: YY_15.6c/.jayaṃ no daivajñaḥ kathayati janaḥ satyavacano
GS41yogay2_u:959: YY_15.7a/.abhijanayutā yūyaṃ sauryaṃ janāḥ kathayanti vo
GS41yogay2_u:960: YY_15.7b/.dhanuṣi kaṇaye cakre śaktyām asau ca kṛtaśramāḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:961: YY_15.7c/.mayi ca bhavatām asti snehaḥ kathan na jayo mama
GS41yogay2_u:962: YY_15.7d/.dviradaturagaṃ syād ākrāntaṃ bhavadbhir idaṃ yadā//
GS41yogay2_u:963: YY_15.8ab/.bṛṃhanti heṣanti śivaṃ bruvanti dīpyanti śocanti mudānvitāś ca/
GS41yogay2_u:964: YY_15.8cd/.nāgāśvaviprānalaśatruyodhāḥ kaḥ saṃśayaś cātra raṇe jayasya//
GS41yogay2_u:965: YY_15.9ab/.dveṣāyanena muninā manunā ca dharmā yuddheṣu ye nigaditā viditās tu te vaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:966: YY_15.9cd/.svāmyarthagodvijahite tyajatāṃ śarīraṃ lokā bhavanti sulabhā vipulaṃ jayaś ca//
GS41yogay2_u:967: YY_15.10ab/.tapasvibhir yā sucireṇa labhyate prayatnataḥ satribhir ijyayā ca yā/
GS41yogay2_u:968: YY_15.10cd/.vrajanti tām āśu gatiṃ manasvino raṇāśvamedhe paśutām upāgataḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:969: YY_15.11ab/.yasya tapo na janāḥ kathayanti no maraṇaṃ samare vijayañ ca/
GS41yogay2_u:970: YY_15.11cd/.na śrutadānamahādhanatāṃ vā tasya bhavaḥ kṛmikīṭasamānaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:971: YY_15.12ab/.sarakṣyamāṇam api nāśam upaity avaśyam etac charīram apahāya suhṛtsutārthān/
GS41yogay2_u:972: YY_15.12cd/.tat kiṃ varaṃ pralapatāṃ suhṛdāṃ samakṣaṃ kiṃ nidhnataḥ parabalaṃ bhṛkuṭīmukhasya//
GS41yogay2_u:973: YY_15.13ab/.hā tāta māteti ca vedanārtthāḥ dhavaṇañ chakṛnmūtrakaphānuliptaḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:974: YY_15.13cd/.varaṃ mṛtaḥ kiṃ bhavane kim ājau sandaṣṭadantacchadabhīmavaktraḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:975: YY_15.14ab/.lokaḥ śubhas tiṣṭhatu tāvad anyaḥ parāṅmukhānāṃ samareṣu puṃsām/
GS41yogay2_u:976: YY_15.14cd/.patnyo 'pi teṣāṃ na hriyā mukhāni puraḥ sakhīnām avalokayanti//
GS41yogay2_u:977: YY_15.15ab/.śatrusainyam avadārya varttatāṃ yat sukhantu kathayāmi tādṛśam/
GS41yogay2_u:980: YY_15.16cd/.pibati ca tadasṛgmadeṣṭagandhaṃ vadanagatāṃś ca śanaiḥ prasṛjya muktān//
GS41yogay2_u:981: YY_15.17ab/.maṇikanakavibhūṣitā yuvatyo dvipaturagaṃ vasu cāmarānilaś ca/
GS41yogay2_u:982: YY_15.17cd/.aviralaśaśikānti cātapatraṃ bhavati na mātṛmukhasya yuddhabhīroḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:986: YY_15.19cd/.padmayā saha palāyate yaśaś caikataḥ kulakalaṅkakārakam//
GS41yogay2_u:987: YY_15.20ab/.ārāmadevakulakūpataḍāgayajñā ye vaḥ kṛtā bilasitañ ca nṛpaprasādāt/
GS41yogay2_u:988: YY_15.20cd/.tad vo vṛtho yadi na niśchalamājimadhye vidyullatāvikasitāni karoti vo 'siḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:989: YY_15.21ab/.citraṃ kim asmin vada sāhasaṃ vā yat svāmino 'rthe ganayanti nāsūn/
GS41yogay2_u:990: YY_15.21cd/.yuddhāt pranaṣṭo vidito 'rimadhye yadvāliśa staṣṭhati sāhasaṃ tat//
GS41yogay2_u:991: YY_15.22ab/.na kevalaṃ gātravibhūṣaṇāni kṣatāni śūrasya raṇe kṛtāni/
GS41yogay2_u:992: YY_15.22cd/.yaśastaror mūlakṛṣikṣatāni tāny eva vaṃśasya vibhūṣaṇāni//
GS41yogay2_u:993: YY_15.23ab/.bhagneṣu yodheṣv avapūrya śastrāṇy ājau pravṛttā vyasavaḥ kṛtā ye/
GS41yogay2_u:995: YY_15.24ab/.yair śvamedhe 'bhihitaṃ phalaṃ vā devair dvijair vā śrutiśāstrakāraiḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:996: YY_15.24cd/.tair eva bhaṅge pratilomagasya pade pade vājimakhaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:997: YY_15.25ab/.svargasya mārgā bahavaḥ pradiṣṭās te kṛcchrasādhyāḥ kuṭilāḥ savighnāḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:998: YY_15.25cd/.nimeṣamātreṇa mahāphalo 'yam ṛjuś ca panthāḥ samare vyāsutvam//
GS41yogay2_u:1003: YY_15.28ab/.jīvito 'pi nihatasya vā raṇe dharma eva hi narasya yudhyataḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:1004: YY_15.28cd/.niścayān na maraṇāṃ hi saṅgare naiva bhīrujarāmaraḥ kvacit//
GS41yogay2_u:1005: YY_15.29ab/.mānamātram avalambya yudhyate kīṭako 'pi vihago 'tha vā paśuḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:1006: YY_15.29cd/.ko hi nāma puruṣas tyajed raṇaṃ svagamānasukhakīrttivittadam//
GS41yogay2_u:1007: YY_15.30ab/.yad abhāvi na me 'sti tat kvacit sadasadbhāvi na me kva yāsyati/
GS41yogay2_u:1008: YY_15.30cd/.iti saṃparicintya paṇḍitāḥ parasainyāni viśanty aviklavāḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:1009: YY_15.31ab/.uraḥ kṛtvā vedyāṃ maṇiphalakagāḍhasthitakucaṃ bhujā vālambyair hītyamaravanitā vyomagṛhagāḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:1010: YY_15.31cd/.apadvāreṇaivaṃ tvaritapadam atyāhur aparā hataṃ hastālaghvair harati suraloko raṇamukhāt//
GS41yogay2_u:1013: YY_15.32d/.bālārkopamam āviśanty abhimukhā yuddhe vimānaṃ hatāḥ//E32
GS41yogay2_u:1014: YY_16.1ab/.atra dhvajapraharaṇāny abhimantritāni kurvanti śatrukadana ripuvāhinīnām/
GS41yogay2_u:1015: YY_16.1cd/.mantraṃ jagāda bhagavān uśanāḥ svaśāstre yal likhyate sa iha pūrvavidhikrameṇa//
GS41yogay2_u:1018: YY_16.3ab/.aśubhakhagamṛgaṃ ca dakṣiṇe nipatati ketupatākabheva vā/
GS41yogay2_u:1021: YY_16.4cd/.yasyendracāpaṃ ca lalāṭasaṃstha tat pṛṣṭhabhāgaḥ kuśalo 'bhihanyāt//
GS41yogay2_u:1022: YY_16.5ab/.nārttā na bhītā na tṛṇānanāś ca vimuktaśastrāḥ prapalayamānāḥ/
GS41yogay2_u:1023: YY_16.5cd/.kṣīṇāyudhā vājigajāvatīrṇā hy ete na badhyā na ca pīḍanīyāḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:1024: YY_16.6ab/.kulaikatantuḥ śaraṇāgato vā kṛtāñjaliryaś ca vadet tava 'smi/
GS41yogay2_u:1025: YY_16.6cd/.ayudhyamānān avagamya hanyāś na pālakān strīparirakṣitāṃś ca//
GS41yogay2_u:1027: YY_16.7cd/.yuddhānte mṛgaśakunaiś ca dīptanādair no bhadraṃ bhavati jaye 'pi pārthivasya//
GS41yogay2_u:1028: YY_16.8ab/.śubhā mṛgapatatriṇo mṛdusamīraṇohlādakṛd grahāḥ sphuṭamarīcayo vigatareṇudigmaṇḍalam/
GS41yogay2_u:1029: YY_16.8cd/.yad anyam api vaikṛtan na vijayāvasāne yadā tadā sukham akaṇṭakaṃ nṛpatir atti deśaṃ ripoḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:1030: YY_16.9ab/.paraviṣayapurāptau sādhudevadvijasvaṃ kulajanavanitāś ca kṣmādhipo noparundhyāt/
GS41yogay2_u:1031: YY_16.9cd/.janapadahitayuktān pūjayet pauramukhyān śubhatithikaraṇarkṣe hṛṣṭasainyo viśoc ca//
GS41yogay2_u:1032: YY_16.10ab/.dṛti manujapatir yathopadeśaṃ bhagaṇavidāṃ prakaroti yo vacāṃsi/
GS41yogay2_u:1035: YY_16.11cd/.samyak pravṛddhasya ca lābhako 'yaṃ tīrtheṣu samyak patipādanāni//
GS41yogay2_u:1037: YY_16.12cd/.prāmye sthire vā 'nidhane ca lagne gṛhaṃ viśec chrītakare 'nukūle/
GS41yogay2_u:1038: YY_16.13ab/.pauṣṇe dhaniṣṭhāsv atha vāruṇeṣu svāyambhuvarkṣeṣu triṣūttarāsu/
GS41yogay2_u:1039: YY_16.13cd/.akṣīṇacandre śubhavāsare ca tithāv arikte ca gṛhapraveśaḥ//
GS41yogay2_u:1041: YY_16.14cd/.kṛtvā sakūpāṃ citibhiś citāñ ca jayanti lokān amareśvarasya//
GS41yogay2_u:1042: YY_16.15ab/.svaviṣayam upagamya mānavendro vallim upayācitakāni cādhikāni/
